p: It is worth noting that the monoterpenes d-limonene, eucalyptol and menthol might be responsible for the antiyeast activity in bitter orange (MIC = 60 µL/mL), eucalyptus (MIC = 60 µL/mL) and Japanese yin yang (MIC = 80 µL/mL) EOs, respectively, as reported by Di Pasqua et al. [ 45] and Bassolé et al. [ 50].
